oscl_bin_stream.h File Reference

Defines a set of binary stream classes which handle portable input / output of binary data regardless of the native byte order. More...

class  OsclBinStream

Detailed Description

Defines a set of binary stream classes which handle portable input / output of binary data regardless of the native byte order.
